headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: layer
body.description: Layer that the rule belongs to identified by the name or UID.

body.name: position
body.description: Position in the rulebase.

body.name: top
body.description: Add rule on top of specific section identified by uid or name

body.name: name
body.description: Rule name.

body.name: action
body.description: "Accept", "Drop", "Ask", "Inform", "Reject", "User Auth", "Client Auth", "Apply Layer".

body.name: enable-identity-captive-portal
body.description: N/A

body.name: limit
body.description: N/A

body.name: content
body.description: List of processed file types that this rule applies on.

body.name: content-direction
body.description: On which direction the file types processing is applied.

body.name: content-negate
body.description: True if negate is set for data.

body.name: field-1
body.description: First custom field.

body.name: field-2
body.description: Second custom field.

body.name: field-3
body.description: Third custom field.

body.name: destination
body.description: Collection of Network objects identified by the name or UID.

body.name: destination-negate
body.description: True if negate is set for destination.

body.name: enabled
body.description: Enable/Disable the rule.

body.name: inline-layer
body.description: Inline Layer identified by the name or UID. Relevant only if "Action" was set to "Apply Layer".

body.name: install-on
body.description: Which Gateways identified by the name or UID to install the policy on.

body.name: service
body.description: Collection of Network objects identified by the name or UID.

body.name: service-negate
body.description: True if negate is set for service.

body.name: service-resource
body.description: Resource of the service identified by the name or UID. When a service-resource exists, the service parameter should contains exactly one service element.

body.name: source
body.description: Collection of Network objects identified by the name or UID.

body.name: source-negate
body.description: True if negate is set for source.

body.name: tags
body.description: Collection of tag identifiers.

body.name: time
body.description: List of time objects. For example: "Weekend", "Off-Work", "Every-Day".

body.name: accounting
body.description: Turns accounting for track on and off.

body.name: alert
body.description: Type of alert for the track.

body.name: enable-firewall-session
body.description: Determine whether to generate session log to firewall only connections.

body.name: per-connection
body.description: Determines whether to perform the log per connection.

body.name: per-session
body.description: Determines whether to perform the log per session.

body.name: type
body.description: "Log", "Extended Log", "Detailed Log", "None".

body.name: confirm
body.description: N/A

body.name: every
body.description: N/A

body.name: unit
body.description: N/A

body.name: frequency
body.description: N/A

body.name: interaction
body.description: N/A

body.name: vpn
body.description: Communities or Directional.

body.name: community
body.description: List of community name or UID.

body.name: from
body.description: From community name or UID.

body.name: to
body.description: To community name or UID.

body.name: community
body.description: List of community name or UID.

body.name: from
body.description: From community name or UID.

body.name: to
body.description: To community name or UID.
